item.title: 德国准备成立千亿欧元基金投资战略资产
item.description: 德国正准备启动一个 1000 亿欧元（约合 1 160 亿美元）的投资基金，以帮助确保国防、能源和关键原材料等战略部门的安全。【原文：Germany is preparing to launch a €100 billion ($116 billion) investment fund to help secure strategic sectors such as defense, energy and critical raw materials.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单在交易前波动中意外下降
item.description: 6 月份，在欧美贸易协议结果尚未明朗的情况下，德国工厂订单出人意料地连续第二个月下降。【原文：German factory orders unexpectedly declined for a second month in June, when the results of a European-US trade deal were still far from clear.】

item.title: 国泰航空乘客收益率下降，创 2008 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd.）的股价创下自 2008 年以来的最大跌幅，原因是收益率的下降幅度超过预期，给公司的增长前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. shares tumbled the most since 2008 as a sharper-than-expected decline in yields clouds its growth outlook.】

item.title: 拜耳从旧药和玉米种子中获得提振，前景看好
item.description: 拜耳公司受益于第二季度对其老化的眼科和血液稀释类大片药物出人意料的强劲需求，帮助这家德国公司上调了今年的业绩预期。【原文：Bayer AG benefited from surprisingly strong demand for its aging blockbuster eye and blood-thinning medicines in the second quarter, helping the German company raise its forecast for the year.】

item.title: 与英伟达会面，中国为美国芯片追踪划出红线
item.description: 在中美两国寻求在旷日持久的贸易战中获得任何筹码之际，中国政府看到了一个机会，那就是通过反对特朗普政府追踪高端芯片的计划来赢得全世界的支持。【原文：As the US and China look for any sort of leverage in a prolonged trade fight, Beijing sees an opportunity to win over the world by taking a stand against the Trump administration’s plans to track high-end chips.】

item.title: 载有纳亚拉号货物的船只在阿曼近海石油转运中心附近抛锚
item.description: 一艘满载纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd.）生产的石油产品的油轮在阿曼附近海域抛锚，该海域以船对船转运而闻名，印度炼油厂正在努力应对欧盟制裁的影响。【原文：A tanker loaded with oil product made by Nayara Energy Ltd. has anchored off Oman in a region known for ship-to-ship transfers, as the Indian refiner grapples with the fallout from European Union sanctions.】

item.title: 瑞士总统将于周三与卢比奥会面以避免关税问题
item.description: 瑞士总统卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）将于周三会见美国国务卿马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio），她将在最后一刻争取达成一项协议，以降低唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）上周征收的 39% 的关税。【原文：Swiss President Karin Keller-Sutter will meet Secretary of State Marco Rubio on Wednesday as she makes a last-minute bid for a deal to lower the 39% tariff imposed last week by Donald Trump.】

item.description: 一家生产流行家用美容设备的韩国公司的市值有望超过行业领先者，因为其第二季度盈利强劲，股价创下历史新高。【原文：A South Korean company behind popular home-beauty devices is poised to surpass an industry leader’s market value, as its stock hit a record after strong second-quarter earnings.】

item.title: 荷兰银行承诺回购 2.5 亿欧元，因利润超预期
item.description: 荷兰银行公布的第二季度利润超出分析师预期，并公布了一项新的回购计划。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV reported second-quarter profit that beat analyst expectations and unveiled a fresh buyback plan.】

item.title: 泰国消费者价格在议息会议前创下 17 个月来最大降幅
item.description: 由于能源成本持续低迷和公用事业收费下降，泰国消费者价格指数创下了自2024年初以来的最大降幅，这为央行在下周的会议上权衡货币宽松政策提供了更大的空间。【原文：Thailand’s consumer price index fell the most since early 2024 as energy costs remained subdued and utility tariffs dropped, providing the central bank more room to weigh monetary easing at its meeting next week.】

item.title: 美国需求强劲，西门子能源将达到预期最高水平
item.description: 在全球电力需求激增的背景下，西门子能源股份公司的燃气轮机和电网设备订单激增，预计全年业绩将达到指导目标的上限。【原文：Siemens Energy AG expects to reach the upper end of its full-year guidance on the back of surging orders for its gas turbines and grid equipment amid a boom in global electricity demand.】

item.title: 美国和中国抢购铂金，铂金紧缺问题迎刃而解
item.description: 长达数年之久的铂金供应紧张局面已经出现，由于中国和美国的买家囤积了大量铂金，银行争相抢购伦敦日益减少的铂金库存。【原文：A years-long supply crunch in platinum has come to a head, with banks scrambling for dwindling stocks in London as buyers in China and the US hoover up much of the available metal.】

item.title: 芝加哥小麦在五年低点附近徘徊，收割量增加
item.description: 芝加哥交投最活跃的小麦期货在五年来的最低水平附近徘徊，因为从乌克兰到欧盟等主要生产国的收割工作正在进行。【原文：The most actively traded wheat futures in Chicago were hovering around their lowest level in five years, as harvests in major producers from Ukraine to European Union get underway.】

item.title: 印度央行在关税不确定性中维持利率不变
item.description: 印度央行保持基准利率稳定，决策者正在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税冲击对印度的影响。【原文：India’s central bank kept the benchmark interest rate steady, as policymakers assess the impact of US President Donald Trump’s tariff shock on India.】

item.title: Unitree 发布机械狗消息后，中国机器人股票大涨
item.description: 在新兴创业公司 Unitree 发布了一段机械狗爬坡、单腿旋转和在岩石地形中穿梭的视频后，中国机器人股价创下新高。【原文：Chinese robotics shares charted new highs after up-and-coming startup Unitree released a video of a mechanical dog scaling slopes, spinning on one leg and navigating rocky terrain.】

item.title: 世界头号大米买家菲律宾停止进口大米 60 天
item.description: 菲律宾将从 9 月 1 日起暂停大米进口 60 天，以帮助当地农民，此举可能会进一步施压全球大米价格，因为大米的头号买家将退出市场。【原文：The Philippines will suspend rice imports for 60 days from Sept. 1 to help local farmers, a move that could further pressure global prices as the top buyer of the grain pulls back from the market.】

item.title: 英国公司聘用承包商代替员工以减少税款支出
item.description: 英国企业在努力应对财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）260 亿英镑（约合人民币 345 亿元）的工资税增税政策时，正在转向自雇人士，以控制成本。【原文：UK businesses are turning to the self-employed in an effort to rein in costs as they try to navigate Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ £26 billion ($34.5 billion) payroll tax hike.】

item.title: 中国政策性银行赶在纳税期限前发行债券
item.description: 在本周晚些时候恢复对利息收入征收增值税之前，中国的政策性银行已开始疯狂发行债券，以锁定较低的收益率。【原文：China’s policy banks have embarked on a bond-issuance spree in an effort to lock in lower yields before the reinstatement of a value-added tax on interest income later this week.】

item.title: 菲律宾将更有力地干预比索连跌
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，作为新战略的一部分，菲律宾央行正在比索长期疲软时期进行更有力的干预，逐步摆脱日常干预。【原文：The Philippine central bank is intervening more forcefully during periods of extended peso weakness as part of a new strategy, gradually moving away from day-to-day intervention, Governor Eli Remolona said.】

item.description: 与上海期货交易所挂钩的仓库中持有的金银跃升至历史新高，这是中国黄金投资需求恢复性增长的又一迹象。【原文：Bullion held in warehouses linked to the Shanghai Futures Exchange has jumped to an all-time high, another sign of resilient demand for gold investments in China.】

item.title: 台湾考虑限制从第三国进口中国汽车
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，比亚迪公司计划通过运输在泰国组装的汽车进入台湾市场，台湾正在评估限制从第三国进口中国品牌汽车的措施。【原文：Taiwan is evaluating measures to restrict the import of Chinese-branded vehicles from third countries, following local media reports that BYD Co. is planning to enter the Taiwanese market by shipping cars assembled in Thailand.】
